org.sensorhub.api.sensor

Interface ISensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Superinterfaces:
    IDataProducerModule<ConfigType>, IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>, IModuleWithDescription
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSensorModule

    public interface ISensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
extends IDataProducerModule<ConfigType>, IEventProducer

    Interface to be implemented by all sensor drivers connected to the system

    Since:
    Nov 5, 2010
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      boolean isConnected()
      Returns the sensor connection status.
      This method must do whatever it can to really detect the presence of the sensor.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the sensor connection status.
        This method must do whatever it can to really detect the presence of the sensor. Consequently, the method can take a long time to complete and must not be called repeatedly.
        Returns:
        true if sensor is actually connected and can communicate with the driver
